column2:
"Thank you, <%me>!
We had a lot of fun, and I'm sure we all made some wonderful memories!"
"Oh, that's right! I picked up this shell on the beach. Isn't it beautiful?"
"When you put it to your ear, you can hear the sound of waves crashing. Hitsugi, Harriet, try listening to it."
"...Yeah, I can hear it. I guess it's nice to have something like that as a lasting memory of summer."
"I agree... I feel it is important that we leave something tangible behind when we disappear."
